achat-habitat.mandatory:
*必填字段
您的个人数据由IFCAM处理，用于管理MOOC第一购买房屋和发送用于教育目的的通讯。 根据法国和欧洲关于保护个人数据的规定，您可以随时行使您访问，纠正和删除与您相关的个人数据的权利，并反对处理您的个人数据。 您也有权定义关于您的死亡后您的个人资料的命运的一般或特定的指导方针。 只有IFCAM执行的个人数据处理具体指南才会被IFCAM注册。 要行使您的权利，您可以发送电子邮件至cnil@ca-ifcam.fr

With regards to the multiple digital experiences that will be on offer to you, BNP Paribas Asset Management France will be collecting personal information that will help us better understand your needs, as well as the data mentioned in the T&Cs.
As a result, do you authorise BNPP AM to analyse your data and are you willing to consequently be contacted by a Client Relationship Manager who will accompany you in your journey? If you wish to modify your consent, please send your request to:
AM.DIGITLEARNING@bnpparibas.com

nespresso.passwordHint: Minimum 10 characters long Passwords must contain characters from three of the following five categories: - Uppercase characters of European languages (A through Z, with diacritic marks, Greek and Cyrillic characters) - Lowercase characters of European languages (a through z, sharp-s, with diacritic marks, Greek and Cyrillic characters) - Base 10 digits (0 through 9) - Nonalphanumeric characters: ~!@#$%^&*_-+=`|(){}[]:;“’<>,.?
